thread.title: Tour and Festival News: Northern Lights and Miami Yoga
thread.title_full: Tour and Festival News: Northern Lights and Miami Yoga - The New York Times

author: Elaine Glusac
title: Tour and Festival News: Northern Lights and Miami Yoga
text:
CELEBRATING THE NORTHERN LIGHTS
Console yourself over winter’s impending darkness with the spectacle of the Northern Lights, best viewed during those long nights. Off the Map Travel , which specializes in Northern Lights tours, will introduce the new Aurora Festival in Bjorkliden, Sweden, Jan. 15 to 17. The inaugural fest in Swedish Lapland, well above the Arctic Circle, will feature scientists, astronauts and other experts speaking on the celestial phenomenon, space weather and photographing the Northern Lights. In addition to talks, the festival will explore the traditional Sami culture of Lapland, and their myths and legends concerning the Northern Lights, at a remote village. Rates for the three-day affair start at £899 per person.
